sample_docs: Public safety and security challenges demand smarter, faster solutions in today's evolving world. Law enforcement agencies are proactively adapting, and Awiros is enabling this transformation with cutting-edge Video AI technology. Our platform strengthens Safe City and Smart City initiatives by delivering real-time insights across People Safety, Integrated Traffic Management Systems (ITMS), Emergency Response, and Incident Investigation—empowering authorities to act with speed, precision, and confidence. Quick Service Restaurants (QSRs) rely on efficiency and safety in their operations. Staff and supervisors must continuously inspect and monitor, facing regular operational challenges. Missing quality and safety indicators can lead to inefficiency, poor customer experience, and lower ratings. ‍ Awiros's Video AI solution uses existing cameras to identify, report, and quantify gaps in efficiency and safety. It provides real-time insights, immediate notifications to supervisors and management, and a quantitative dashboard. ‍ By processing video streams from CCTV cameras, the Awiros Platform delivers relevant insights to the right users in real time. Awiros' Video AI applications for QSRs include but are not limited to: Products AppStack aiscope ATOM Developers Resources Youtube LinkedIn Twitter About Us Company Contact Us Blogs Careers . Tailored AI for Every Industry - aiscope customizes AI models for real-time anomaly detection and smarter decisions. Smarter Inspections, Instant Alerts - aiscope's Generative AI delivers tracking and probing inspections, ensuring quality and safety at every step. Awiros offers scalable deployment models to suit your business needs, whether on-site, edge + cloud, or on cloud. Deploy AI solutions within your infrastructure for complete data control, security, and compliance, ideal for enterprises with strict privacy mandates. Bring AI closer to the action with edge computing for ultra-low latency, reduced bandwidth consumption, and real-time insights where they matter most. Leverage cloud-based AI for flexible, scalable, and cost-effective video analytics, accessible anytime, anywhere, without heavy infrastructure investments. AI in Your Hands Empower teams with portable AI solutions with instant insights for better decision making, perfect for field inspections, security, and remote operations. Appliances AI-Powered appliances built for real-time video intelligence with seamless integration, scalability, and efficiency. Delivering next-gen analytics for smarter security and operational excellence. V-Stream Enterprise A 2U rack-mountable appliance for Large-scale AI deployments, supporting 150+ deep learning applications. Pre-installed with Awiros OS for best-in-class computer vision and AI-driven video analytics. V-Tower A Plug-and-play AI-ready appliance built for small to mid-sized deployments , transforming CCTV networks into AI-powered systems with agentic AI solutions. EdgePlus-7 Designed for remote AI deployments , such as highways, warehouses, and retail outlets, enabling on-site AI processing with centralized management. Awiros Cloud Deploy the Awiros Video Intelligence Platform on any public or private cloud with ease. Built for scalability and flexibility, Awiros leverages cloud orchestration to deliver powerful AI video analytics for enterprises , SMEs , and smart homes . Smart Tech for Smart Retail Awiros, by Awidit Systems, is a new IoT platform that uses in-store CCTV cameras and other sensors to automatically measure the real-time visibility of products and shelves in a store in a fine-grained manner. "More Visibility = More Revenue" Awiros provides actionable metrics such as footfalls in different areas of a store, dwell time at each shelf and overall shopper movement patterns. These metrics are leveraged by stores, manufacturers and marketers to measure conversion rate of products, increase revenue and make better sales forecasting. Smart Tech for Smart Retail Awiros, by Awidit Systems, is a new IoT platform that uses in-store CCTV cameras and other sensors to automatically measure the real-time visibility of products and shelves in a store in a fine-grained manner. "More Visibility = More Revenue" Awiros provides actionable metrics such as footfalls in different areas of a store, dwell time at each shelf and overall shopper movement patterns. These metrics are leveraged by stores, manufacturers and marketers to measure conversion rate of products, increase revenue and make better sales forecasting. Increased Revenue Awiros monitors shoppers preferences closely and gives an accurate picture of hot-zones in the store, over different time scales. This information helps in deciding end-cap locations and product placement to boost the sales of most favorable and profitable products. Improved Sales Forecasting With the growth of omni-channel retail and increasing retail competition, shoppers tend to explore their options before making a final purchase. Number of shopper visits and dwell time helps in forecasting and planning for overall sales for a product. Insightful Metrics Awiros provides a number of actionable metrics at a fine-granularity to help stores and manufacturers gather feedback on "Pricing, Packaging and Placement" of their products. Some of the metrics provided by Awiros are shelf footfall, dwell time at each shelf and conversion rate. Awiros monitors shoppers preferences closely and gives an accurate picture of hot-zones in the store, over different time scales. This information helps in deciding end-cap locations and product placement to boost the sales of most favorable and profitable products. With the growth of omni-channel retail and increasing retail competition, shoppers tend to explore their options before making a final purchase. Number of shopper visits and dwell time helps in forecasting and planning for overall sales for a product. Awiros provides a number of actionable metrics at a fine-granularity to help stores and manufacturers gather feedback on "Pricing, Packaging and Placement" of their products. Some of the metrics provided by Awiros are shelf footfall, dwell time at each shelf and conversion rate. How it Works! Data Collection with Sensors Awiros uses a combination of different sensors like motion, IR and Sonar to observe shoppers, and most of the data is extracted from the footage from CCTV cameras typically already installed in stores. We make use of proprietory technology that intelligently coalesces data from different sources to localize a shopper inside a store in with a high degree of precision. Analytics and Visualization Awiros' sensors generate a tremendous amount of data that contains a variety of parameters such as footfalls overtime with respect to each product, dwell time at each shelf and the overall movement pattern and occupancy in a store. Our analytics tools process this data to create visual insights such as a heatmap of the store showing regions of the store with maximum footfall, maximum dwell time and/or bottlenecks in shopper movement. Insights and Recommendations The data visualising tools of Awiros provide a great deal of information in compact and succint infographics, which is leveraged by our clients in various ways. Morevoer, our analytics team periodically provides actionable insights and recommendations that helps our clients to maximize the footfalls inside the store, improve the product conversion rate, and significantly improve the overall shopper experience inside a store. Awiros is Awesome! Awiros provides highly actionable data, metrics and insights into shopper movement, her path selection and preferences, which are useful to various stakeholders invovled in the retail industry.
